import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem, } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((product) => product._id == match.params.id); return ( <> Go back

{product.name}

 Cena: {Math.floor(product.price * 3.6)} PLN

Opis:

{product.description}

 Cena: {product.price} PLN status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "dostępny" : "niedostępny"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
